Content: Offset to image data in bytes
Total image file size in bytes
Ditto key (0 = same as previous frame; 1 = new)
Generic section header length in bytes
Industry specific header length in bytes
Right to use or copyright statement
Data sign (0 = unsigned; 1 = signed) / Core set images are unsigned.
Transfer characteristic for image element 1 (see table 5A)
Colorimetric specification for image element 1 (see table 5B)
Bit size for image element 1 (see table 3A)
Offset to data for image element 1
Border validity: XL, XR, YT, YB border
Film mfg. ID code (2 digits from film edge code)
Film type (2 digits from film edge code)
Offset in perfs (2 digits from film edge code)
Prefix (6 digits from film edge code)
Count (4 digits from film edge code)
Shutter angle of camera in degrees
Temporal sampling rate or frame rate (Hz)
Time offset from sync to first pixel (Î¼s)
User defined ---- Postage stamp, processing logs, etc.
Image data should start at block boundary (8-K blocks are recommended for efficient use of tape storage devices)
